title: Say It's Not Fake
description: “I can’t lose my daughter. She’s my baby girl. My everything. So…” He took a deep breath. “Whitney, will you marry me?”When hot single dad Kyle Webber asks me this question, I’m in shock.After all, it’s been years since we’ve seen each other. Although I’ve never been able to forget him. That’s what your first big love does to you, right?I made the biggest mistake of my life when I left our small town to chase my dreams in LA. He went on to marry Josie, the biggest b*itch in town.A woman who gives selfish a whole new name.No surprise that it didn’t last. But now she wants to get sole custody of their sweet little daughter Katie. To convince the court that he has a stable family life, Kyle asks me for help.He wants us to fake a marriage. To pretend to be in love.Really? Live with him in the same house? Sleep in the same bed? It sounds like a plan destined to end in misery. My misery. Because since I’ve met Kyle again, my heart screams one sentence over and over again: “Please, SAY IT’S NOT FAKE!”Full-length enemies to lovers fake marriage romance with a Happily Ever After! Contains a preview of "Unexpected Heat".
author: Sarah J. Brooks
